description.fr:
{%FightStarted}
Invoque {Summoning:930} dans l'équipe adverse.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} à la {%pvmax} et {value:percent1,percent,+} à l'{%AT} des {%Family_Cochon_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Valable uniquement sur l'{WorldZone:5}.</rem>
description.en:
{%FightStarted}
Summons {Summoning:930} on the opposing team.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} to {%Family_Cochon_Name,plural:other}' {%pvmax} and {value:percent1,percent,+} to their {%AT}.
\---
<rem>Valid only on {WorldZone:5}.</rem>
description.es:
{%FightStarted}
Invoca a {Summoning:930} en el equipo enemigo.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} a la {%pvmax} y {value:percent1,percent,+} al {%AT} de los {%Family_Cochon_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Válido únicamente en la {WorldZone:5}.</rem>
description.de:
{%FightStarted}
Beschwört {Summoning:930} im gegnerischen Team.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} auf die {%pvmax} und {value:percent1,percent,+} auf den {%AT,plural:one} der {%Family_Cochon_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Gilt nur im Gebiet „{WorldZone:5}“.</rem>
description.pt:
{%FightStarted}
Invoca {Summoning:930} na equipe adversária.
\---
{value:pc,percent,+} à {%pvmax} e {value:percent1,percent,+} ao {%AT} dos {%Family_Cochon_Name,plural:other}.
\---
<rem>Válido apenas na {WorldZone:5}.</rem>
